NewsArticle.Title: Arena Host Requirements
NewsArticle.Content: After testing the initial Arena Host requirements, it seems necessary to raise the bar. The following changes have been made to become an Arena Host, 40 Arena victories and an insight of at least 90. Aislings that have been arrested still cannot become an Arena Host. Mundanes have the power to remove Arena Host abilities if they are abused. If an Aisling has their abilities removed they will be given a mark of "Disgraced Arena Host" on their legend.
